note.snippet: ‘‘‘Tava dukkhaṃ mama dukkhaṃ, ubhinnaṃ ekato mano
‘‘‘Aññaṃ tehaṃ varaṃ dammi, mā yācittho tathāgataṃ

note.original: nāmena (sabbattha) evamuparipi; aṭṭhathāyaṃ pana pubbe gottenātipadaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ
buddhaseṭṭhassa santike (?) evamuparipi; etadeva hi upālittherāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ
note.snippet: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike

note.original: āvāse patte vasse (syā.), āvāseva ṭhite vase (ka.)
susīlo asamo santo (sī.), paññavā yuttacāgo ca (syā.)
majjhe mayhaṃ bhavā assu (syā. pī. ka.)
ye bhave samatikkamiṃ (syā. ka.), yo bhavesu pakittayi (ka.)

note.snippet: Kapitthā ca bahū tattha, pupphitā jīvajīvakā

note.original: mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakamhi (sī. syā.)

alternatives.alternative: mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakamhi
mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakamhi

note.snippet: ‘‘‘Yathāpi urago jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tacaṃ
Mama bhakkhaṃ gavesanto, āhiṇḍāmi vane ahaṃ

note.original: aṭṭhadīpaphalena hi; upaṭṭhissantimaṃ jantuṃ (syā.), aṭṭha dīpā phalena hi; na jahissanti’maṃ jantuṃ (?)

alternatives.alternative: aṭṭha dīpā phalena hi; na jahissanti’maṃ jantuṃ

note.original: aṭṭhadīpaphalena hi; upaṭṭhissantimaṃ jantuṃ (syā.), aṭṭha dīpā phalena hi; na jahissanti’maṃ jantuṃ (?)

alternatives.alternative: aṭṭha dīpā phalena hi; na jahissanti’maṃ jantuṃ
